short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text on any foreign website and get instant translations, grammatical explanations, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover a new way to learn languages with our innovative Google Chrome plugin! Highlight any foreign text and get instant translations, grammatical explanations, and more.

Turn your everyday browsing into a language learning experience. Whether you're exploring news from Paris or reading a blog from Tokyo, our plugin makes language learning effortless and fun.

With our plugin, you're not just learning a language - you're embracing a culture. Start your language learning journey today and unlock the world with every click.

Experience the joy of learning a new language, one website at a time.
